name: Lunar Mission (Lamp Lighter)
description:
---LUNAR MISSION--

You exist on the frontiers of unknown space and have accepted a dangerous mission...

Only the best of the best will manage to make landfall... Will you be one of them?

Thrust your craft safely to the landing pad on the surface without crashing. Approach too fast and your craft will explode. Watch your fuel!

--CONTROLS--

Arrow keys: Thrust
